Articles.Content:
Documentation. It's pitiful. Is it part of the whole KSP experience? Scrabble around figuring out that each part isn't as straight-forward as it is presented, because not much info is presented, and having to go search forums because that's the only documentation? Like flying by the seat of your pants or something?

Not a feature.
Greetings @CosmicCharlie - What kind of info were you after?  Expanding the part information gives you most of the relevant data except for drag and you have an overlay for that.
